be.ac.ulb.infof307.g09.database

Class ProjectCollaborationDatabase

  • java.lang.Object
    • be.ac.ulb.infof307.g09.database.Database
      • be.ac.ulb.infof307.g09.database.ProjectCollaborationDatabase

  • public final class ProjectCollaborationDatabase
extends Database
    This class enables the retrieval of project collaborations information. It makes use of the Singleton Design Pattern.

      • updateAcceptedColumn

        public void updateAcceptedColumn(int projectId,
                                 User collaborator,
                                 int accepted)
                          throws DatabaseException,
                                 ConnectionFailedException
        Update the accepted column of a project collaboration.
        Parameters:
        projectId - The projectId of the project to find in the where clause
        collaborator - the collaborator
        accepted - The accepted column to update
        Throws:
        DatabaseException - when something wrong happens during a database transaction
        ConnectionFailedException - If the connection to the database fails

                                                          throws DatabaseException,
                                                                 ConnectionFailedException
        Gets the projects that have been accepted and that the sender has not read his invitations sent to his collaborators yet.
        Parameters:
        sender - the sender who has sent the invitations.
        Returns:
        the list of projects that have been accepted
        Throws:
        DatabaseException - If the resultSet does not contain one user or if there is an error during the access to the database.
        ConnectionFailedException - If the connection to the database fails

        public void deleteRowWithRefusedInvitation(Project project,
                                           User collaborator)
                                    throws DatabaseException,
                                           ConnectionFailedException
        Deletes the row with a refused invitation.
        Parameters:
        project - project to delete.
        collaborator - the collaborator to the project that has refused the invitation.
        Throws:
        DatabaseException - If the resultSet does not contain one user or if there is an error during the access to the database.
        ConnectionFailedException - If the connection to the database fails

      • updateInvitationRead

        public void updateInvitationRead(Project project,
                                 User collaborator)
                          throws DatabaseException,
                                 ConnectionFailedException
        Updates the InvitationRead column in the database to 1. It means that the sender of invitation has read the window with all the invitations that he sent to his collaboration.
        Parameters:
        project - the project which is the ProjectID column.
        collaborator - the collaborator which is the UserId column
        Throws:
        DatabaseException - If the resultSet does not contain one user or if there is an error during the access to the database.
        ConnectionFailedException - If the connection to the database fails
